verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Command <S%H6680><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'When <S%H3588><s%> you enter <S%H935><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> is the land <S%H776><s%> that shall fall <S%H5307><s%> to you as an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> [even the] land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> according to its borders. <S%H1367><s%>

'Your southern <S%H5045><s%> sector <S%H6285><s%> shall extend <S%H1961><s%> from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%> along <S%H5921><s%> the side <S%H3027><s%> of Edom, <S%H9000><s%> and your southern <S%H5045><s%> border <S%H1366><s%> shall extend <S%H1961><s%> from the end <S%H7097><s%> of the Salt <S%H4417><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%> eastward. <S%H9506><s%>

'Then your border <S%H1366><s%> shall turn <S%H5437><s%> [direction] from the south <S%H5045><s%> to the ascent <S%H4610><s%> of Akrabbim, <S%H4610><s%> and continue <S%H5674><s%> to Zin, <S%H6790><s%> and its termination <S%H8444><s%> shall be to the south <S%H5045><s%> of Kadesh-barnea; and it shall reach <S%H3318><s%> Hazaraddar, <S%H2692><s%> and continue <S%H5674><s%> to Azmon. <S%H6111><s%>

'And the border <S%H1366><s%> shall turn <S%H5437><s%> [direction] from Azmon <S%H6111><s%> to the brook <S%H5158><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and its termination <S%H8444><s%> shall be at the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

'As for the western <S%H3220><s%> border, <S%H1366><s%> you shall have <S%H1961><s%> the Great <S%H1419><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> that is, [its] coastline; <S%H1366><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> shall be your west <S%H3220><s%> border. <S%H1366><s%>

'And this <S%H2088><s%> shall be your north <S%H6828><s%> border: <S%H1366><s%> you shall draw <S%H8376><s%> your [border] line <S%H8376><s%> from the Great <S%H1419><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%> to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor. <S%H2023><s%>

'You shall draw <S%H8376><s%> a line <S%H8376><s%> from Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%> to the Lebo-hamath, and the termination <S%H8444><s%> of the border <S%H1366><s%> shall be at Zedad; <S%H6657><s%>

and the border <S%H1366><s%> shall proceed <S%H3318><s%> to Ziphron, <S%H2202><s%> and its termination <S%H8444><s%> shall be at Hazar-enan. This <S%H2088><s%> shall be your north <S%H6828><s%> border. <S%H1366><s%>
'For your eastern <S%H9506><s%> border <S%H1366><s%> you shall also draw <S%H184><s%> a line <S%H1366><s%> from Hazar-enan to Shepham, <S%H8221><s%>

and the border <S%H1366><s%> shall go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from Shepham <S%H8221><s%> to Riblah <S%H7247><s%> on the east <S%H6924><s%> side <S%H6924><s%> of Ain; <S%H5871><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> shall go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> and reach <S%H9256><s%> to the slope <S%H3802><s%> on the east <S%H9506><s%> side <S%H9506><s%> of the Sea <S%H3220><s%> of Chinnereth. <S%H3672><s%>

'And the border <S%H1366><s%> shall go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> and its termination <S%H8444><s%> shall be at the Salt <S%H4417><s%> Sea. <S%H3220><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> shall be your land <S%H776><s%> according to its borders <S%H1367><s%> all <S%H5439><s%> around. <S%H5439><s%>' "

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "This <S%H2088><s%> is the land <S%H776><s%> that you are to apportion <S%H5157><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> among you as a possession, <S%H5157><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> to the nine <S%H8672><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> tribes. <S%H4294><s%>

"For the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7206><s%> have received <S%H3947><s%> [theirs] according to their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> and the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> according to their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> and the half-tribe of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> have received <S%H3947><s%> their possession. <S%H5159><s%>

"The two <S%H8147><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> tribes <S%H4294><s%> have received <S%H3947><s%> their possession <S%H5159><s%> across <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> opposite Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> eastward <S%H9506><s%> toward the sunrising. <S%H4217><s%>"
Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"These <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> shall apportion <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> to you for inheritance: <S%H5157><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun. <S%H5126><s%>
"And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> leader <S%H5387><s%> of every tribe <S%H4294><s%> to apportion <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> for inheritance. <S%H5157><s%>
"And these <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the men: <S%H376><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh. <S%H3312><s%>
"And of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> Samuel <S%H8050><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud. <S%H5989><s%>
"Of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> Elidad <S%H449><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Chislon. <S%H3692><s%>
"And of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> a leader, <S%H5387><s%> Bukki <S%H1231><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jogli. <S%H3020><s%>

"Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph: <S%H3130><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> a leader, <S%H5387><s%> Hanniel <S%H2592><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ephod. <S%H641><s%>
"And of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> a leader, <S%H5387><s%> Kemuel <S%H7055><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shiphtan. <S%H8204><s%>
"And of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> a leader, <S%H5387><s%> Elizaphan <S%H469><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Parnach. <S%H6535><s%>
"And of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> a leader, <S%H5387><s%> Paltiel <S%H6409><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azzan. <S%H5821><s%>
"And of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> a leader, <S%H5387><s%> Ahihud <S%H282><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shelomi. <S%H8015><s%>
"And of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> a leader, <S%H5387><s%> Pedahel <S%H6300><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud. <S%H5989><s%>"

These <S%H428><s%> are those whom <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> to apportion <S%H5157><s%> the inheritance <S%H5157><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>
